name: Triangle Head's Adventure 1.5
description:
A complete re-make of Triangle Head's Adventure for #AdvJam2016. The graphics are now drawn by a talented artist. And the game is ported from AGS to Unity, we wrote our own adventure system in Unity!

Story
"I have got a curse. A curse that shows itself every full moon. My head turns into a triangle!

I have got a date with a pretty girl. She is about to come to my place. I must do something before she arrives! I have got only two minutes!"

You are given 120 seconds to fix your head before your date arrives.

Team
Ahmet Kamil Keleş: Programming, story, design
Turgut İşin: Arts
Ezgi Çetin: Design
Oğuzhan Orhan: Design

Musics: Çağlar Şahin, Talha Kaya
